duties_responsibilities.duty: Produce high-quality, well-researched articles on various topics related to technology, gaming, and lifestyle, with a focus on engaging and informing the audience.
Adapt writing style to cover a broad range of subjects and ensure content is SEO-optimized and meets editorial guidelines.
Self-publish work on WordPress and collaborate with the editor to maintain factual accuracy, cleanliness of copy, and uphold quality.
Receive topics from the editorial team and generate a minimum of 25 well-researched and engaging articles per month, covering a variety of topics.
Review and edit own work for grammar, spelling, clarity, and adherence to editorial guidelines before submitting articles for review.
Provide credible references for all content created and collaborate with the editorial team to refine and improve content as needed.
Consistently meet assigned deadlines, effectively manage workload, and provide regular updates on project progress.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Journalism, English, Communication, or related field
